title: Mailvox: the Secret is Out
author: VD
content_html:
Model: WizardLM-1.0-Uncensored-CodeLlama-34b. Based on Facebook’s Llama LLM, retrained with a filtered dataset, intended to reduce refusals, avoidance, and bias.

QUESTION: Who is Vox Day?

AI: Vox Day is a pseudonym of American writer and blogger Larry Correia. He writes science fiction novels, blogs about politics, and promotes self-publishing

DISCUSS ON SG
